code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./components/Reducer/RootReducer";var composeEnhancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;export default function configureStore(){return createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancer(applyMiddleware(thunk)));}
